title: pixie studio logo typeface?
content:
Could anyone help me ID this typeface or perhaps suggest me with something similar, especially with the letter "t". I would very much appreciated, thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110421083348im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pixiestud_id_4458.jpg)

Sorry with the small picture.
author: dians

comments.content: That 't' is not far from the 't' in FF Netto (see to your right). The rest is a lot like [Myriad](http://web.archive.org/web/20110421083348/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/myriad_pro_regular/?sample_text=pixiestudio) with some trimmed vertical strokes.

Thanks, Stephen. I noticed the similarity with FF Netto but this typeface is less condenensed and more rounded. You really make a good point about Myriad. I couldn't see that before you mentioned it. I guess the person who design this has done pretty good job.

My next typeface on the list is probably [Neo Tech](http://web.archive.org/web/20110421083348/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=neo+tech&x=0&y=0) by Sebastian Lester.
